data.title: The Mambo Kings Play Songs of Love Signed
data.meta_description: New York: Farrar Straus and Giroux, 1989. First edition. Softcover. Advanced Reading Copy. Hijuelos' Pulitzer Prize winning second novel. Basis for very good movie with Armand Assante, and Antonio Banderas. A close to near fine copy in illustrated wrappers. Signed by Hijuelos on the title page. Item #129440
data.text:
New York: Farrar Straus and Giroux, 1989. First edition. Softcover. Advanced Reading Copy. Hijuelos' Pulitzer Prize winning second novel. Basis for very good movie with Armand Assante, and Antonio Banderas. A close to near fine copy in illustrated wrappers. Signed by Hijuelos on the title page.

Item #129440
